Commands:
  mli book               # Use /api/v1/books endpoint family
  mli help [COMMAND]     # Describe available commands or one specific command
  mli ping               # Use /api/v1/ping endpoint family
  mli tree               # Print a tree of all available commands
  mli vanishing_message  # Use /api/v1/vanishing_messages endpoint family
  mli version            # Print the version number
  mli warm_fuzzy         # Use /api/v1/warm_fuzzies endpoint family
